post.body: Thanks so much for the well wishes! I think it's gotten as worse as it's going to get-so now I just have to ride the rest out.
Sorry for the late reply... but that reply-ku was most excellent! :D
Gadget-obsessed robots are just looking for better parts.
Lucky for some, is unlucky for others/Fate kisses some, and others it smothers
A delicious necessity! ;D
Just this guest strip for now -- nothing too official-like.
some are mega hot/some are super cool/some play by the brand new rules/and some just keep it old school
They really tasted good, no fooling.
Here's the recipe: http://tinyurl.com/5mabwr
Aw shucks, thanks. XD
Oh no. I think I'm hungry now. And there is NO way for me to get that exact combo of snacks at this time of night. Damn.
Oh, good idea! Thanks so much!
Hee hee!
Christmas and I have a blood feud as well. But it doesn't involve t-shirts. It's a sordid tale of eggnog and despair.
Hee hee! Now I'm blushing. XD
AHHHH! Living caffeine!
XD
I wish I was asleep. Unless I already am, and am suffering from "night twitters."
That's one fancy schmancy Christmas you got going there.
Ooo... scientific AND delicious. Perfect.
YES!
Oh man, I WANT.
Hmm... the little cupcake wrapper makes the cupcake. I like the way you think.
Yes, a shrink ray! Brilliant!
Hooray! Thanks cybersanta!
I'm thinking of getting my brain wired for internet. Cut out the middle man, that's what I say.
Oooo! Now THAT'S a drink!
I just believe that there is no drink that can't be improved by being served "en flamb√©." XD
There is much to discover in the wilds of my head. Oh look, a penny! Wait... how did that get in here?
I knew you would understand. And so do the pups, I think. XD
For the purpose of haiku-ness? Chock-late. XD
Ooo... you just may have me beat. But now I want chocolate even more. Damn.
I'm a haiku cheat. XD
Hee hee! Hello! XD
Oh crap. Damn those tricksy bows. Should be all fixed now. Thanks!
Long ago my mind decided to secede from my body... and we've been fine without her ever since. Ooo.. shiny thing!
I can in no way condone such an action... and yet I am unbearably curious about the deliciously dangerous results.
Kawaiiku #84: wee goldfish crackers/a whole bowl of smiling snacks/i like happy food
New Kawaii Not: Snowflake Affirmation. Plus new t-shirts! http://www.kawaiinot.com/?p=220
Feels like squirrels are square dancing in my throat. Drunk square dancing. With cleats.
Kawaiiku #83: i'm embalmed in bed/doped up with cold medicine/drowning in mucus
Kawaiiku #82: cookie-baking wait/are they done now? or now? now?/wait... how about now?
Kawaiiku #81: cookie crumbs in bed/must be sleep snacking again/why don't i sleep jog?
Kawaiiku #80: little lettuce leaf/lays limp between sandwich bread/lovely, but useless
New Kawaii Not: Guest strip! And new icons! http://www.kawaiinot.com/?p=218
Kawaiiku #79: snowflake on my tongue/tastes different than expected/...afraid to look up
Kawaiiku #78: damn my feet are cold/my poor toes clink together/like ice cubes in socks
Kawaiiku #87: oh last pizza slice/picked clean of pepperoni/cold...naked... then gone #haiku
Kawaiiku #86: stop ringing those bells!/i will shove them somewhere bad/...you can jingle home
New Kawaii Not: The Hardest Button to Button http://www.kawaiinot.com/?p=221
Kawaiiku #85: dessert's too crucial/to save till after dinner/carpe the cupcakes!
Kawaiiku #88: can't breath through nose still/used last tissue, took last pill/...time for auger drill? #haiku
Kawaiiku #89: shake it sweet jello!/oh the delicious motion!/the dance at meal's end #haiku
What are my eyes doing at night that produces all this crust in the morning?! Maybe it involves secret crime fighting. With eye goop.
Kawaiiku #90: personal physics:/i'm perpetual motion?/no... i'm entropy #haiku
New Kawaii Not: Ho Ho Ho My! http://www.kawaiinot.com/?p=222
Kawaiiku #91: i want a ray gun/it will fix all my problems/one *zap* at a time #haiku
New Kawaii Not: A take-out date! http://www.kawaiinot.com/?p=223
I want a cupcake as big as my head. But then technically it would a whole cake at that point. So then I don't want it. A vicious circle.
If you hid mistletoe in someone's sandwich, would it make them a magnet for surprise smooches? Or would it just kill them? Oops.. too late.
Kawaiiku #94: i like xmas drinks/creamed and egged and alcohol-ed/...and sometimes on fire #haiku
Kawaiiku #93: ephemeral fries/heaven but for a moment/after that -- congealed #haiku
Kawaiiku #92: rising after noon/and the alchemy of brunch --/sunday morning-fu #haiku
Today felt like molasses... but I'm cooking it into a gingerbread tomorrow. (Food metaphors make everything easier.)
Kawaiiku #97: lurking danger waits/in my microwaved pot pie/-- my tongue's the victim #haiku
Oh wow! My twitter-thing was nominated for a Shorty Award by @missneko! Thanks! http://shortyawards.com/user/kawaiinot
Is eating Christmas cookies for breakfast wrong? Or just overly festive?
Reason not to trust me baking Christmas cookies #1: Doc Manhattan cookie. Not seasonally appropriate. http://twitpic.com/w88z
Reason not to trust me baking Christmas cookies #2: Inordinate amount of not-very-jolly swearing when I singe my fingers.
Reason not to trust me baking Christmas cookies #3: More icing on me than on cookies.
Kawaiiku #96: gingerbread cookie/go run as fast as you can/i will catch you...*CRUNCH* #haiku
Kawaiiku #95: my philosophy?/peanut butter and chocolate=/the world ain't all bad #haiku
New Kawaii Not: Christmas balls! http://www.kawaiinot.com/?p=224
Am up to my non-existent balls in snow.
"...and buried with a stake of holly through his heart." Hey, do you suppose Scrooge might have been a Victorian vampire hunter?
